map.yml:
--- #ref
# ADD OR REMOVE CHANNELS AND PRESS RUN
channels:
  - cds-alerts
  - abc-alerts
--- #<<ref
!_ route_tmpl:
  receiver: !tmpl '{{$v}}-slack'
  matchers:
    - name: channel
      value: !yq $v
--- #export
!yq .
---
routes: !map .route_tmpl .channels
yq.yml:
--- #export
id: example
items:
  - 1
  - 2
  - 3
---
key: val
id: !yq .id
nums: !yq .items
